Name: Value Ruff
LongDescription: Makes it easier to find Hidden Stairs in dungeons. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Phanpy and Donphan.  You can get a Value Ruff at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Phanpy Claw, a Phanpy Card, and a Phanpy Tag. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
